product_name: McNett Seal Cement for Neoprene - Black
long_description: Have a tear or snag in essential neoprene paddling gear? Get your wetsuit back in action with the black McNett Seal Cement(TM) for neoprene. Featuring a rapid cure time of 5 - 10 min., the McNett Seal Cement quickly repairs and cements wet suits, dry suits and waders at home or in the field. It can also be used to repair and reinforce the seals on dry suits, booties, paddling gloves, orthopedic supports or even inflatable toys. When it's cured, the repair is durable, waterproof and elastic to preserve the stretch of the original garment. Black formula works best with black garments.
short_description: Have a tear or snag in essential neoprene paddling gear? Get your wetsuit back in action with the black McNett Seal Cement(TM) for neoprene.
